project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement file reading to load the text file.
Count the frequency of each word in the text.
Determine and sort the top 10 most common words.
Implement the display functionality to output the results in the terminal.
Write tests for each of the above features.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly.
